quote: I have to be alone very often. I'd be quite happy if I spent from Saturday night until Monday morning alone in my apartment. That's how I refuel.
author: Audrey Hepburn

quote: The only reason why we ask other people how their weekend was is so we can tell them about our own weekend.
author: Chuck Palahniuk

quote: cozy+smell of pancakes-alarm clock=weekend
author: Amy Krouse Rosenthal

quote: Love me like Saturday night, like three glasses of champagne, like the room is spinning, like you're drunk on my love.
author: C.J. Carlyon

quote: Imagine living a life where everyday are your Saturdays and Sundays. Make everyday your weekend. Make everyday a play-day…
author: James A. Murphy

quote: Every day is a gift. But some days are packaged better.
author: Sanhita Baruah

quote: Sundays are like confetti floating in the air in slow motion, in the evening they reach the ground and you hope a bit of wind could blow on them so they could fly a bit longer.
author: Alain Bremond-Torrent

quote: No weekend, all weakened
author: Toba Beta

quote: Time spent for temporary happiness like movie or outing or weekend on a beach is all synthetic
author: Vikrmn

quote: Paddy Eagan, stay away from falling signs for a bit and you'll be as right as rain come the weekend.
author: Elizabeth C. Bunce

quote: Saturday is the mightiest day of the week. It's unshakably, overwhelmingly superior. Not only is it a day off of school, the following day is also a day off, like some kind of Super Saiyan bargain sale.
author: Wataru Watari

quote: Anybody have plans to stare at their phone somewhere exciting this weekend?..if yess..let's go together.
author: Nitya Prakash

quote: Always take some of the play, fun, freedom and wonder of the weekend into your week & your work
author: Rasheed Ogunlaru

quote: Although I understand that all days are equal with 24 hours each, most of us agree that Friday is the longest day of the week and Sunday the shortest!
author: D.S. Mixell

quote: The problem is that I hate holidays… I hate the whole idea of it… That for you today is Christmas for me is nothing different than the typical week or weekend.
author: Deyth Banger

quote: This was, by far, the absolute worst weekend in his life.
author: Jason Medina

quote: Freedom begins where work ends- the realm of freedom is after hours, on the weekend, on vacation, and not at work.
author: Peter Frase

quote: Saturday's the world is a better place again.
author: Golden Flower

quote: FACT!: Time goes slower on a Friday afternoon.
author: Anthony T. Hincks

quote: Don't worry about letting the dogs out. It's Friday! Let them have a great weekend, too.
author: Anthony T. Hincks
